scripts.build:yaml: swaglow build -i swagger -o output && swagger-tools validate output/swagger.yml
scripts.build:swift: VERSION=$(node -pe 'require("./package.json").version') && npm-run-all -s build:yaml clean:code "build:code -- swift3 -c config.swift.json -DpodVersion=$VERSION"
scripts.publish:swift: VERSION=$(node -pe 'require("./package.json").version') && npm run build:swift && cd output/code && sh git_push.sh chuross CHQiitaApiClient && git tag $VERSION && git push -f origin $VERSION
